remarks: The set of translations for a fiducial atom ` D ` .  (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
trnset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trnset.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
trnset.p $e |- .+ = ( +P ` K ) $.
trnset.o $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
trnset.w $e |- W = ( WAtoms ` K ) $.
trnset.m $e |- M = ( PAut ` K ) $.
trnset.l $e |- L = ( Dil ` K ) $.
trnset.t $e |- T = ( Trn ` K ) $.
trnsetN $p |- ( ( K e. B /\ D e. A ) -> ( T ` D ) = { f e. ( L ` D ) | A. q e. ( W ` D ) A. r e. ( W ` D ) ( ( q .+ ( f ` q ) ) i^i ( ._|_ ` { D } ) ) = ( ( r .+ ( f ` r ) ) i^i ( ._|_ ` { D } ) ) } ) $.
$d D f q r $.
$d K f q r $.
$d L f $.
$d W q r $.
